alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 12:54PM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning tonight, duration of freezing temperatures between 6 and 10 hours, and duration of below 28 degrees will be between 2 and 4 hours. For the Freeze Watch Sunday night, freezing temperatures around 32 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Volusia County. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Cover above-ground exposed pipes to protect them from freezing.
